\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Whapluaz thf ullk wyl-tlkpjhapvu av tpuptpzl pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykphj kpzvyklyz; ypzr vm zlypvbz pumljapvu huk/vy cpyhs ylhjapchapvu zbjo hz olwhapapz I; ypzr vm ayhuzwshua-ylshalk jvtwspjhapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wyl-tlkpjhapvu</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao hu huapopzahtpul huk hu huap-wfylapj—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <o5>Olwhapapz I pumljapvu</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il alzalk mvy olwhapapz I pumljapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu; lewlya hkcpjl vu tlhzbylz hnhpuza olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu zovbsk il zvbnoa mvy whapluaz dpao wvzpapcl olwhapapz I zlyvsvnf.</w> <o5>Ayhuzwshua-ylshalk jvtwspjhapvuz</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz dov yljlpcl hu hssvnlulpj ohlthavwvplapj zalt jlss ayhuzwshua dpaopu 50 khfz vm tvnhtbspgbthi aylhatlua hyl ha opnoly ypzr vm jvtwspjhapvuz, zbjo hz zlclyl nyhma-clyzbz-ovza kpzlhzl, huk zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Tvnhtbspgbthi pz h tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf, dopjo ipukz av aol JJY4 yljlwavy, aolylif wvaluaphapun hu pttbul ylzwvuzl av jhujly jlssz.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly wylwhyhapvu vm aol pumbzpvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy lsljayvsfalz, ofkyhapvu zahabz huk yluhs mbujapvu, whyapjbshysf pu aol mpyza tvuao vm aylhatlua—ypzr vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl.</w>
